analysis.key_quote: The proposal to move staff with ‘policy’ in their title or position description into ‘at will’ positions will impact subject matter experts who have deep knowledge of their office/agency statutes and the associated outgrowth of rules, regulations, procedures etc. i.e., institutional knowledge.
analysis.rationale: The comment opposes the proposed rule by emphasizing the importance of non-politically appointed staff and their expertise, highlighting concerns about politicization and the potential loss of institutional knowledge. It also raises issues regarding due process and the implications of removing experienced employees without protections.
